} .item-slider__image img { max-height:{{ section.settings.image_size_desktop }}px; object-fit: cover; object-position: center; max-width: 100%; width: 100%; height: auto; transition: all .3s; } .item-slider .swiper-button-next, .item-slider .swiper-button-prev { display: flex; -webkit-box-pack: center; justify-content: center; -webkit-box-align: center; align-items: center; border: 1px solid rgb(211, 212, 213); width: 48px; height: 48px; border-radius: 50%; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255); box-shadow: rgb(0 0 0 / 25%) 0px 0px 24px 0px; transition: border-color 125ms ease-in-out 0s; top: calc(50% - 45px); } .item-slider .swiper-button-next:hover, .item-slider .swiper-button-prev:hover { border-color: rgb(116, 121, 124); } .item-slider .swiper-button-prev::after, .item-slider .swiper-button-next::after { color: rgb(77, 85, 89); font-size: 0px; } .item-slider .swiper-button-next::before { content: ''; display: inline-block; display: inline-block; width: 12px; height: 12px; transform: rotate(135deg); border-bottom: 3px solid rgb(77, 85, 89); border-right: 3px solid rgb(77, 85, 89); margin-left: 5px; } .item-slider .swiper-slide { width: auto; } .swiper-button-prev { left: 2%; } .swiper-button-next { right: 0%; } .slide_info { background-color: {{section.settings.slide_info_color}}; padding: 18px; } .slider-links { text-decoration: none!important; } .slide_info-name { font-family: {{section.settings.slide_title_font.family}}; font-weight: {{section.settings.slide_title_font.weight}}; font-size: {{section.settings.slide_title_font_size}}px; line-height: 1.33; letter-spacing: 0.5px; color: {{section.settings.slide_title_color}}; margin:0; padding-bottom: 2px; } .slide_info-description { font-family: {{section.settings.slide_desc_font.family}}; font-weight: {{section.settings.slide_desc_font.weight}}; color:{{section.settings.slide_desc_color}}; line-height: 1.5; font-size: {{section.settings.slide_desc_font_size}}px; margin-top: 6px; letter-spacing: 0.5px; margin:0; } .slide_info-price { font-family: {{section.settings.slide_desc_font.family}}; } /* Media */ @media (max-width: 992px) { .item-slider__image img { max-height:{{ section.settings.image_size_mobile }}px; } .{{ section.id }}-wrapper { padding:20px; } .swiper_title { padding-left: 0;
